name: Witchorb
description:
Ethylene the witch does her job - which today means investigating an abandoned cottage. 

Cottage, yes! Abandoned? Not so much.

------><<
WITCHORB
>><------

A short story without any words

Platforming / broom-control puzzles

15-45 mins playtime, depending on skill

Keyboard controls

>><------

Use your flaky broomstick to collect the Orbs Of Power! Refuel by landing on the ground (if you can!) and find the exit.

Navigate the treacherous winds, spooky ghosts, perilous vortexes...

...to escape the Hole Of Infinite Darkness and confront the phantom that put you there!

>><------

Featuring lots of puzzle-platform levels, comic booky animations, jittery glitch arcade graphics, lo-fi fuzz-pedal music + sfx, spooks and a witch.

------><<

This game free over Halloween

Download it now before the spell wears off!
